Developer.title: Developer

PorjectHeader.title: My Latest Projects
PorjectHeader.description: Discover my latest projects, completed during my free time as a self-taught learner or during training and internships.

Epigusto.title: Epigusto
Epigusto.description: 2D retro-style platformer developed in 48 hours during an Epitech hackathon.

GusCss.title: GusCSS
GusCss.description: GusCSS is a lightweight and modular CSS framework that allows for the rapid creation of modern and responsive interfaces, inspired by Bootstrap but simplified for learning and customization.

Luvio.title: Luvio
Luvio.description: Modern dating application developed in PHP with an MVC architecture, allowing users to find love based on their interests.

Cinéscope.title: Cinéscope
Cinéscope.description: Web application for cinema management developed in PHP, allowing the management of movies, screenings, and subscriptions.

AINAO.title: AINAO
AINAO.description: Prototype of an iOS application, this project was completed during the Apple Foundation Extended program training!

NetNinja.title: NetNinja
NetNinja.description: Prototype of an iOS application, this project was completed during the Apple Foundation Program training !

SpaceInvader.title: Space Invader
SpaceInvader.description: I recoded the famous Space Invaders game in Python from scratch !

AboutCard.title: About Me
AboutCard.content: Since childhood, I have been passionate about computers and new technologies. I started programming in 2018 with Python in high school. After joining E2C and the Web@cademie by Epitech, I enhanced my skills through internships at JetDev and Sergic.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
tasks: Creation of Python scripts to retrieve and integrate open data into the company's database
Design of SQL tables and views
Development of functions and query optimization
Data integration and manipulation in the database

experiences.title: Web Developer
tasks: POC AI for an application that generates reception reports from audio
Creation of an API using FastAPI

educations.title: Web@cademie by Epitech
skills: Frontend Development: HTML5, CSS3 (Flexbox, animations, Bootstrap), JavaScript, React
Backend Development: PHP (Laravel), Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB
Project Management: Agile methodologies (SCRUM), creation of specifications
Full Stack: MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), APIs and microservices
Soft Skills: Written and oral expression, technological watch
